key_talking_points: Edmonton's player (8477932) was penalized for holding-the-stick at 17:06 remaining in the first. Florida will go on the power play, already leading by one goal.
Florida's player (8476454) was called for tripping at 16:28 of the first. Edmonton now gets a chance on the power play to tie the game.
The first few minutes have seen a flurry of shots on goal, indicating an aggressive start to the game for both teams.
for_commentary_agent.context: The game has medium momentum with several shots on goal and two penalties called. The score is close, so maintaining a balance between play-by-play and insightful commentary is ideal.

Penalty: FLA player (8476454) tripping. EDM Power Play.
